mutants.code:
def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = []
    for word in words:
        word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalpha()))
        reversed_word = word[::-1].capitalize()
        reversed_words.append(reversed_word)
    reversed_string = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

mutants.original_line: word = ''.join(char for char in word if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: word = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in word if char.isalpha()))

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = []
    for word in words:
        word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalpha()))
        reversed_word = word[::--1].capitalize()
        reversed_words.append(reversed_word)
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string
